name: Protect the Kastle
description:
A Shmup type game, with a touch of magic!
You have 2 minutes to defend your Kastle from the enemies

Controls:
Mouse Pointer to move Player
Mouse Left Button to shoot
Escape to pause

Assets:
https://www.reddit.com/r/Littlewargame/comments/4dt8g9/all_of_littlewargames_spr...
https://opengameart.org/content/castle-tiles-for-rpgs 

You can view the source code here!
